dcterms:creator: B. Webber
R. Prasad
A. Lee
A. Joshi
dcterms:description: The Penn Discourse Treebank (PDTB 3.0) provides annotations for English discourse structures following the D-LTAG framework, distinguishing 43 relation labels organized in a hierarchy consisting of sense, class, and type.
dcterms:title: Penn Discourse Treebank (PDTB 3.0)

dcterms:creator: L. Abzianidze
J. Bjerva
K. Evang
H. Haagsma
R. Van Noord
P. Ludmann
D.-D. Nguyen
J. Bos
dcterms:description: The Parallel Meaning Bank (PMB) aims to create a multilingual corpus of translations annotated with compositional meaning representations.
dcterms:title: Parallel Meaning Bank (PMB)

dcterms:creator: M. Stede
A. Neumann
dcterms:description: The Potsdam Commentary Corpus provides annotations for discourse research, focusing on the discourse structure of German texts.
dcterms:title: Potsdam Commentary Corpus

dcterms:creator: W. Long
B. Webber
D. Xiong
dcterms:description: TED-CDB is a large-scale Chinese discourse relation dataset derived from TED talks, providing annotations for discourse relations.
dcterms:title: TED-CDB (Chinese Discourse Bank)

dcterms:creator: D. Zeyrek
A. Mendes
Y. Grishina
M. KurfalÄ±
S. Gibbon
M. Ogrodniczuk
dcterms:description: TED-MDB is a parallel corpus annotated in the PDTB style, covering multiple languages including English, Polish, German, Russian, European Portuguese, and Turkish.
dcterms:title: TED-MDB (TED Multilingual Discourse Bank)

dcterms:creator: A. Yang
S. Li
dcterms:description: SciDTB is a discourse dependency treebank specifically designed for scientific abstracts, providing annotations for discourse relations.
dcterms:title: SciDTB (Scientific Discourse Treebank)
